General.Name: Suzhou Crystal Clear Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Crystal Clear Electronic Material Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, manufacturing, and sales of technological new materials in China. The company offers photoresist products for use in IC, TFT array, LED, Touch panel, advanced packaging, and other fields; ultra-high purity reagents, such as H2O2, H2SO4, NH4OH, NH4F·HF, HNO3, HCI, and C4H13NO; functional materials comprising developers, strippers, etching liquids, and cleaners; lithium battery materials, including modified and sodium carboxymethyl cellulose, conductive paste, NMP, silica materials, and electrolytes; and liquid SO3, refine H2SO4, smoke H2SO4, and industrial H2SO4. It also engages in the power generation, transmission, and supply business; investment management, asset management, and industrial investment; and provision of business information and business management consulting services. The company was formerly known as Suzhou Crystal Clear Chemical Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Crystal Clear Electronic Material Co., Ltd. in August 2021. Crystal Clear Electronic Material Co.,Ltd was founded in 2001 and is based in Suzhou, China.
